title: Introducing: Liv Dawson
body:
This debut from seventeen year old **Liv Dawson** is special.

_Tapestry_ is immaculately produced, allowing her exquisite vocals to take centre stage, managing to come across as simultaneously touchingly delicate and alluringly powerful. This is undoubtedly one of _the_ debut tracks of the year. Check it out below.

Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
